name: DIY Pink Leopard Print Fleece Cosplay Bunny Hat
description:
This product is made to fit an adult head, it may still fit an older child, but may fit a bit baggy. The cap is made of black fleece, while the ears and strip are made of non stretchy vellum. This should help keep the hat lasting much longer to reduce stretching, unlike most online bought handmade hats.
  • Ears:
    • 16 inches long
    • 9 inches wide
  • Cap:
    • 8 inches tall
    • 22 inches round
The product also comes in:
  • Purple Leopard Print
  • Blue Zebra Print
  • Purple Zebra Print
  • Light Pink Skull & Rainbows Fleece

options.name: Light Pink Skull and Rainbow Fleece
